programme.title: Colette
programme.desc: 90-year-old Colette Marin-Catherine confronts her past by visiting the German concentration camp Mittelbau-Dora where her brother was killed. As a young girl, she fought Hitler's Nazis as a member of the French Resistance. For 74 years, she has refused to step foot in Germany, but that changes when a young history student named Lucie enters her life. Prepared to re-open old wounds and revisit the terrors of that time, Marin-Catherine offers important lessons for us all.

programme.title: La caravana: On the road with the migrant caravan
programme.desc: Thousands of migrants from Honduras, El Salvador and Guatemala head north hoping to find work and a better life in the US. The largest Central American caravan in decades keeps growing as thousands more join this journey – but when they reach Mexico, the migrant caravan starts taking different directions.

programme.title: Our House
programme.desc: Brian was down on his luck and sleeping rough in Liverpool. Lawrence was a successful hotelier and property developer. David was a self-proclaimed hippy in a dead-end job. Together they formed an unlikely alliance and created a homeless shelter like no other. But can it last?

programme.title: Finding Ashley | Murder, corruption and cattle barons in Kenya
programme.desc: Finding Ashley: a Native American family's desperate search for their missing relative | Murder, corruption and cattle barons in Kenya

programme.title: Behind the scenes on Birmingham derby day with football fans and police
programme.desc: Police on the streets separating rival supporters, cordons restricting access around the ground, holding the away end back after full time: these are familiar experiences for football fans attending derbies up and down the country. Here we go behind the scenes at Birmingham City v Aston Villa to explore how police and fans interact with each other on match day

programme.title: Buyers Club
programme.desc: In 2013, a cure was found for hepatitis C. It could save millions of lives, but its price tag of between $40,000 and $84,000 for 84 pills puts it far out of most patients' reach. However, in India, a generic version of the drug is available for less than $1,000. Denied the affordable medication he needed, Greg Jefferys defied the US pharmaceutical company that holds the patent to set up a worldwide supply network for the generic version.

programme.title: Fighting addiction on Pine Ridge reservation
programme.desc: Whiteclay, Nebraska is a tiny unincorporated town that sits on the border with South Dakota. Until its closure by state officials, its four liquor stores sold more than 4m cans of beer a year, almost entirely to members of Lakota Sioux tribe on the Pine Ridge Indian reservation, where the sale of alcohol is banned. The Guardian spent time on the reservation to understand the impact of alcohol on its residents – and the activists and Lakota tribe members determined to keep the town closed

programme.title: A Childhood on Fire
programme.desc: When Nick Hurndon was six years old he and his two older brothers were set on fire by their stepfather in their San Francisco home. Now in his early forties, Nick is a retired Marine and is raising two sons that are about the same age he was when he was set ablaze. This is a film about childhood trauma and the effects that abuse had on his sense of self worth, and the ways in which one man is interrupting a cycle of violence so that his two sons can thrive

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Black Sheep tells the story of Cornelius Walker, whose life changed on 27 November 2000 - the day Damilola Taylor was killed. Damilola was 10, the same age as Cornelius. He lived five minutes away. He had the same skin colour. Cornelius's mother, scared for her son's safety, moved their family out of London. Cornelius suddenly found himself living on a white estate run by racists. But rather than fight them, Cornelius decided to become more like the people who hated him.

programme.title: Teranga: the migrant-run Afrobeat nightclub uniting Naples
programme.desc: Fata and Yankuba are two young Gambians with ambitious dreams, who fled dictatorship and poverty and landed in Naples, only to discover a new kind of violence: a pernicious climate of racism and an unhelpful immigration system. Their only escape from the psychological torture of years spent waiting for documents in squalid camps is a small underground club in the heart of the city. The Teranga nightclub provides a rare safe space for migrants to meet young Italians.

programme.title: From the Bronx to Yale: the power of high school 'speech'
programme.desc: High school students from Democracy Prep school in the South Bronx, New York, compete against young people across the US at a ‘speech' competition at Yale University, a form of competitive acting. Last year's champion, Stephen, is hoping to regain his crown, but ambitious newcomers are coming up behind him. It's not only trophies at stake, this could be their only chance of a college scholarship

programme.title: Lady of the Gobi
programme.desc: On Mongolia's coal highway to the Chinese border, truck driver Maikhuu dreams of a better life and financial security for her three children. However, the road from the mines to China is riddled with accidents, toxic pollution, poor hygiene and now, amid the Covid crisis, drivers face days of quarantine on the border. Trapped in a hazardous industry, Maikhuu's journey reflects the human and environmental costs of Mongolia's mining boom.

programme.title: Flat Earth: meet the people casting aside 2,500 years of science
programme.desc: Though not a new phenomenon, flat Earth theory has enjoyed a huge resurgence recently. A YouGov poll indicated that a third of Americans aged 18 to 24 were unsure of the shape of our planet, in spite of scientific proofs from Pythagoras to Nasa. Why has this happened now, and what does it tell us about society today?

programme.title: Killing Gävle
programme.desc: In the small city of Gävle, northern Sweden, there is an annual fight between local custodians and mischievous pagans for the spirit of Christmas. Each year since 1966, business owners have paid for a 13-metre (40ft) effigy of a goat to be made of straw and displayed in the central square from the first day of Advent. In 37 of those years, the goat has been burned down or damaged by shadowy outsiders, sometimes within a few hours of going up.

programme.title: A Bad Idea Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Leo and Marlon are trapped in their lives, working dead-end jobs, trying to find some way to make things exciting. The best idea they've come up with is a heist. They choose the house, execute the 'perfect' break in, but don't bank on accidentally arming the alarm system once inside. As their break in flips into a break out, the pair unexpectedly discover a housesitter, introducing a whole host of new problems that the pair hadn't even considered. Their dubious escape suddenly becomes far more difficult, complicated by a hostage situation, double crosses, and most challenging of all, sexual tension.

programme.title: Made
programme.desc: Jon Favreau and Vince Vaughn team up with rap superstar Sean Combs and the legendary Peter Falk ("Columbo") in this wickedly hilarious tale of two hapless guys trying their best to go bad... with criminally comic results.

programme.title: 3 Days With Dad
programme.desc: The last thing Eddie Mills (Larry Clarke) wants to do is go home to deal with his dying Dad Bob (Brian Dennehy). But the Catholic guilt gnaws at him, and he returns home to his crazy family. Eddie is supposedly in charge with sorting out plans, but not only isn't he ready for any of this, but neither are his manic siblings or his overbearing step-mother (Leslie Ann Warren), and his bear of a father argues that while he's still alive, he's calling the shots.

programme.title: Smart People
programme.desc: A widowed professor (Dennis Quaid) experiences a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: Lauren Mauldin (Thora Birch) is a strong-willed but misguided young woman who encourages her millions of blog followers to apply her scientific formula to all romantic relationships in order to prevent heartache. If you follow her six-month PIG Theory, you will always have the upper hand and you will never be cheated on! Her plan works smoothly until her sister Gena introduces her to the charming and undefeated womens' advocate attorney, Calvin Chesney (Chris Klein). Calvin refuses to believe human connections can be so easily categorised. He challenges Lauren to a competition to prove her theory wrong.

Captain Nemat, their chief, tries to persuade the ship-owner and the official authorities not to get the ship back. On the other hand, he is selling the iron parts of the ship piece by piece. “Iron Island” is the story of those whose ignorance makes them simply trust those who are always ready to abuse their trust.

programme.desc: Alina is a girl of Gypsy origins, who lives and works in Paris since years. Once returned in her native village in Sardinia, nearby Cagliari, she establishes a friendly relationship with Giampaolo Esposito, a fifty years old police chief.

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Emma has made a career out of her sensible, and responsible approach to relationships. She has a radio talk show, and a loving relationship with her fiancé, Richard. Then Emma finds out that she is already married to a man she's never met before

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: Based on a story of the same name by Dashiell Hammett, the crime thriller The House on Turk Street was directed by veteran filmmaker Bob Rafelson.

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Evan is a low-level, dutiful employee stuck in a boring job at a soul-killing evil corporation but at least he gets to spend his days with his beautiful co-worker and girlfriend Amanda and his slacker best friend Tim.

programme.title: Dont Say A Word
programme.desc: When Dr. Nathan Conrad's daughter is kidnapped, a secret held by one of his catatonic patients may be his only hope.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor returns to the site of his greatest career triumphs and re-connects with a long-ago love while unexpectedly falling for the hard-charging Air Force watchdog assigned to him.

programme.title: We Feel Fine
programme.desc: A web of chance transactions and shared concerns among an incongruent group of Aucklanders.

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: Leona Brule was just 18 years old when she went to visit her boyfriend in Edmonton, Alberta, from Fort Providence, Northwest Territories, where she had been working as a live-in-nanny. It was March 1989…and about a year later when Leona stopped coming home to visit her mother, Leona's mom filed a police report. RCMP suspects that Leona was living on the streets in Edmonton in the 1990s, but Leona has never been found, and her case remains open.

programme.title: Mission 88
programme.desc: Anderson, un scientifique, se porte volontaire pour une mission de reconnaissance à bord de la navette spatiale ISRA 88. Le voyage est risqué et devrait durer plusieurs années. Avec le lieutenant-colonel Richards comme seul compagnon à bord, Anderson doit en effet tenter d'atteindre les limites de l'univers.

programme.title: West of Eden
programme.desc: The affluent farmer's son is everything Billy desires. The farm is everything the head drover wants. A story of forbidden love, revenge and a family torn apart, inspired by true events.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A young woman discovers her elite Manhattan preparatory school harbors a dark secret.

programme.title: Alter
programme.desc: Alter, a psychological thriller about a man who is convinced that he's found his childhood abductor, and is determined to get him to confess by any means necessary.

programme.title: The Wedding Chapel
programme.desc: Uninspired and newly single painter Sarah is down on her luck and wants nothing more than to get away from her problems. When she decides to take a trip to visit her mom, she becomes involved in the efforts to save a local church which is in danger of closing down.

programme.title: Model
programme.desc: Models and wild cards from around the country enter into this year's competition to see if they have what it takes to become the next ultimate model. The models are each interviewed by our 3 Judges, Pieter Black, Coenraad De Mol, Kholofelo Mabusela and show host Christia Visser. As 26 models advance into the next stage, will they have what it takes to get through a Mardi gras catwalk and stills photo shoot to make it into the top 12 and Model house?

programme.title: I Think I Do
programme.desc: The relationship between three sisters, as one is left at the altar on her wedding day.

programme.title: Wrecked
programme.desc: Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality.

programme.title: The Assassin's Code
programme.desc: Rookie Cleveland detective Michael Connelly is desperate to escape from under the shadow of his late father, a detective convicted of a drug scandal within the department when Michael was a boy. When a million dollars' worth of drugs are stolen from police custody and the detective on the case soon turns up dead, Michael begs his captain for the assignment and the chance to prove himself. But when his investigation points toward a crime network, Michael faces pressure to maintain the status quo as he plays a cat-and-mouse game with the powers that be, while under the watchful eye of a ghost-like assassin ensuring their secrecy.

programme.title: Extraction
programme.desc: A scientist who has invented a technology to construct virtual realities from people's memories finds himself in a perilous situation, after he reluctantly allows it to be used for a purpose he never imagined.

programme.title: Is It Just Me?

programme.title: The Immigrant

programme.title: Gigantic

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: Eric Lombard is at a crossroads - does he continue to pursue his long-shot dream of playing professional football, or does he start the next phase of his life, and apply to law school? As he struggles with this decision, Eric - along with his longtime girlfriend, Colleen - visits his cousin in Florence. There, to his surprise, he gets involved with the ancient local sport of Calcio Storico - and everything that Eric has assumed about his life is challenged.

programme.title: Elvis And Anabelle
programme.desc: Annabelle (Lively) has never known what life is like outside the fiercely competitive world of beauty pageants her mother's (Steenburgen) constant demands of physical perfection driving her to despair. Elvis (Minghella) doesn't have his mortician's license, but that doesn't stop his eccentric father from putting him to work in the family mortuary. A miracle brings the unlikely couple together, taking them on a road trip where they will discover themselves and true love.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: While undergoing surgery, a wealthy young man discovers that the surgical team intended to murder him.

programme.title: The Big Empty
programme.desc: An actor with no money can make some quick cash by delivering a suitcase to the middle of nowhere.

programme.title: Bound
programme.desc: Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A rookie pilot and her four friends find themselves trapped in a deadly showdown with an unknown force.

programme.title: Chatroom
programme.desc: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Imogen Poots, Daniel Kaluuya and Richard Madden star in this all too relevant psychological thriller about the dangerous and murky world of online chatrooms. A chillingly real depiction of internet vs. real life - a disturbed teen tries to alleviate his own misery by making others miserable. A world where where anything can happen and where violence is real.

programme.title: Smiley Face Killers
programme.desc: From the mind of Bret Easton Ellis (American Psycho) comes an all-new terrifying killer tale. When a murderous cult arrives on campus, Jake (Ronan Rubenstein, Orange is the New Black) finds himself plagued with mysterious messages that lead him and his friends down the rabbit hole towards murder and mayhem. Jake must decide if the cryptic messages are a prank or if his life is truly at risk.

programme.title: June
programme.desc: Dark. Demonic. Disturbing. Nine-year-old orphan June has been found a new adoptive family. What her new parents do not know is that June is possessed by an ancient dark spirit named Aer. As the evil Aer plans to destroy everything, will June be able to save her new family and herself? In the vein of The Omen and Orphan, this chilling supernatural cult horror is a genre classic and one not to miss.

programme.title: Combat Trains: Combat Trains
programme.desc: [EPISODE 4: Secrets & Lies] Get on board this compelling documentary tracking the extraordinary journey of trains! Trains have been crucial in the war efforts of major conflicts from carrying troops, to moving hospitals, to being actual weapons - these incredible vehicles are brimming with history! Presenting expert interviews, authentic reconstruction and engineering archive, this series promises non-stop insight.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Brothers tells the powerful story of two siblings, thirty-something Captain Sam Cahill and younger brother Tommy Cahill, who are polar opposites. A Marine about to embark on his fourth tour of duty, Sam is a steadfast family man married to his high school sweetheart, the aptly named Grace, with whom he has two young daughters. Tommy, his charismatic younger brother, is a drifter just out of jail who's always gotten by on wit and charm.

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: A portrait of the singular storyteller who's lived it all, seen it all but never told it all until now. From humble beginnings to sold out world tours Sheryl Crow's life has been extraordinary, creating a legacy that continues to inspire.

programme.title: The Road
programme.desc: THE ROAD is a thrilling and deeply moving tale of survival as a father and his young son journey across a barren, post apocalyptic America. Respectfully adapted from Cormac McCarthys hallowed novel, THE ROAD boldly imagines a future in which men are pushed to the worst and the best that they are capable of a future in which a father and his son are sustained by love.

programme.title: Siberia
programme.desc: John Wick meets John Le Carre with Keanu Reeves as a gun- toting diamond dealer going up against the Russian mob, in this chilly, action-packed thriller. Lucas Hill, an American diamond trader, travels to Russia negotiate a deal involving some very rare gems that he plans to sell to the oligarch Boris Volkov. When his contact for the diamonds goes missing, and he gets on the wrong side of Volkov, Hill nds himself stranded in the frozen wastes of Siberia, with only a local bar owner to help him face the deadly situation.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff
programme.desc: The year is 1845, the earliest days of the Oregon Trail, and a wagon team of three families has hired the mountain man Stephen Meek to guide them over the Cascade Mountains. Claiming to know a short cut, Meek leads the group on an unmarked path across the high plain desert, only to become lost in the dry rock and sage. Over the coming days, the emigrants must face the scourges of hunger, thirst and their own lack of faith in each other's instincts for survival. When a Native American wanderer crosses their path, the emigrants are torn between their trust in a guide who has proven himself unreliable and a man who has always been seen as the natural enemy.

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Directed by acclaimed Oscar-winning actor Robert De Niro ('Goodfellas,' 'The Godfather: Part II') and adapted from Chazz Palminteri's successful one-man play (now a hit Broadway musical), 'A Bronx Tale' is a character-driven crime drama. Growing up in the Bronx in the 1960s, an adolescent is torn between his working-class father and a violent yet charismatic crime boss.

programme.title: The Last Act
programme.desc: Oscar® winning director, Barry Levinson directs Oscar® winning actor Al Pacino and Greta Gerwig in THE LAST ACT from the screenplay by Buck Henry and Michal Zebede based on the novel The Humbling by Philip Roth. Simon Axler is a famed stage actor who becomes depressed and then suicidal when he suddenly and inexplicably loses his gift. In an attempt to get his mojo back, he has an affair with a lesbian woman half his age. Before long, the relationship causes chaos as people from the romantic duo's pasts resurface in their lives.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: In Silent Witness, Dermot Mulroney (Zodiak, Copycat) plays prominent defense attorney Tony Lord, who returns to his hometown to defend an old friend, played by Michael Cudlitz (TNT's Southland). The friend is a teacher accused of murdering one of his students, and the case re-opens the heartache from Tony's own high school days, when he was a student falsely accused of murdering his first love. Silent Witness also stars Anne Heche (Hung, Men in Trees) as Sue Robb, the wife of the accused teacher, and Judd Hirsch (Damages, Taxi) as Saul Ruben, Tony Lord's close friend and associate.

programme.title: The Contract

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: A high-stakes, do or die thriller set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Attica Gage (Gina Carano: Deadpool, Fast & Furious 6) pursues a ruthless outlaw, at the head of a dangerous, criminal gang. With the help of Doc, (John Hannah: The Mummy), Attica must learn to fight her inner demons whilst bringing the man to justice…against all odds. An action-extravaganza set to get pulses racing!

programme.title: Transference
programme.desc: An edge of your seat sci-fi thriller about the lengths a wife will go to protect her husband. Kelley Chandler (Polish) is a CIA agent working at the very knife edge of modern technology. When his latest mission lands him in a coma, his wife Tess (Agron), does everything she can to find out what really happened. After discovering that Kelley may have been set up as part of an inside job, Tess must stop the chief of the CIA from killing her husband, no matter what it takes.

programme.title: Scandal Made Me Famous
programme.desc: The “Affluenza Teen” (Ethan Couch.) In 2013 this teen from an affluent family drunkenly runs down a disabled SUV killing four people and injuring nine. The trial thrusts Ethan and his family into the spotlight when his lawyers claim he cannot serve jail time due to Affluenza and being brought up to believe that wealth buys privileges. The ensuing judgement of probation and rehab leads to public outrage and a bizarre two-week Manhunt.

programme.title: Scandal Made Me Famous
programme.desc: Lisa Nowak is an American Astronaut and national hero until in 2007 when she allegedly wears a diaper so she can drive straight from Houston to Orlando without stopping. Her sole intention is to kidnap her long-time lover's new girlfriend. Though she fails in her attempt, the case gains National attention when details and video footage of the attack are released to the public ultimately forcing NASA to face scrutiny over their selection process.

programme.title: Scandal Made Me Famous

Once rescued from the SLA the trial that follows will captivate the nation and lead to two Presidents commuting and pardoning the 19 year old criminal.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the “Knight-a-Kon” in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever “infiltration” mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the “Minitrex” – a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for “Best Costume.” The prize: “Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1.” The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's just…about…to get the book when…the impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! “Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1” is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macy…she deserves to read it.

programme.title: The King's Tournament
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights – the Tighty Knighties – are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks “How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero.” But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament – she's agreed to be in “princess mode” for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Monster Chef
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his “Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition” cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. “Hot chili makes hot monsters!” Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands – meaning Jestro's – could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. “Nope, not hot enough…waaaay too much garlic….you call that hot?!” (BELCH!)

programme.title: Designer Set and Video Part 2

programme.title: The LEGO Technic Bugatti Chiron Podcast
programme.desc: Bugatti and LEGO may be two very different companies, but both share an ambition to only create the very best. This is evident in their respective mottos: for Bugatti, “If comparable… it is no longer Bugatti” and for LEGO, “Only the Best is Good Enough”. In this episode, Julius Kruta, Head of Tradition at Bugatti and Signe Wiese, Culture Mediator at LEGO reveal the history behind these two famous brands.

programme.title: The LEGO Technic Bugatti Chiron Podcast
programme.desc: What elements make up the Bugatti Design DNA? And what were the special challenges living up to this heritage in the new Chiron? In this episode, Achim Anscheidt, Director of Design at Bugatti, describes what makes a Bugatti a Bugatti. Meanwhile Andy Woodman, Senior Design Manager, LEGO Technic, explains the challenge of translating the Bugatti design tradition into an authentic Technic model.

programme.title: Let's Play
programme.desc: SeaPeeKay is back in the LEGO gaming playing in The LEGO Ninjago Movie Video Game. He is saving Ninjago City from Lord Garmadon in this action packed Let's Play! YouTubers N60 Sean & NitroLukeDX play LEGO Racers Nintendo 64 in Episode 2 of our LEGO Retro Games series.

programme.title: LEGO Racers / SeePeeKay Plays
programme.desc: Little Carly & Ropo play LEGO Racers Nintendo 64 in Episode 1 of our first ever LEGO Retro Games series. SeaPeeKay is back in the LEGO gaming den as he takes us through Chapter One - Good Morning Ninjago in his Let's Play of The LEGO Ninjago Movie Video Game.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Villains
programme.desc: TT Games' Arthur Parsons and Matt Ellison are playing LEGO DC Super Villains at the LEGO booth during San Diego Comic Con 2018. This video includes footage of the level one walkthrough, new character creation feature, and interesting game facts about the development of the video game.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Villains
programme.desc: LEGO DC Super Villains video game developers James and Phil sat down for an exclusive developer commentary taking a look at new gameplay and showcasing the brand new character creator. Players will create and play as an all-new super-villain throughout the game, unleashing mischievous antics and wreaking havoc in an action packed story!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tailor's Magic Needle: Tailor Smurf has to make an outfit for every Smurf before the Fall fashion show. Brainy Smurf wants to help him and, using Papa Smurf's book of Magic, he conjures up a magic needle that sews ten times faster than tailor... But is it really any good?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Time Capsule: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Clockwork Smurf: Handy has built a very complex Smurf machine that does everything. It proves dangerous when it nearly destroys the village, but comes in useful when, with the help of the other Smurfs, it saves the young prince Gerard's kingdom from the queen aunt Imperia's dastardly intentions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lure Of The Orb: Allura the Enchantress possesses a very special magic orb whose energy, as she says, can lift spirits and inspire the uninspired! All you have to do is hold the orb between your hands... It is true the orb bestows inspiration, up to a point. But its side effects can be very dangerous, as the Smurfs find out when they become addicted to it...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Harmony Steals The Show: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life! Papa Smurf demands a jury trial with ghostly jurors and a judge that finds Harmony innocent and Ghost Writer guilty of plagiarism.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bigmouth's Friend: Gargamel and Balthazar command a giant robot to force King Gerard to hand over Clockwork Smurf. When the robot is about to destroy the castle, Clockwork's new, large, and awkward friend Bigmouth defeats the robot. Clockwork is hurt in the battle but Handy fixes him and implants a voice box so he can say "Hi"!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Magic Stick: With a borrowed recipe from Homnibus, Papa Smurf creates a magic stick that Clumsy takes and loses in the woods. Soon after, Bigmouth comes for a visit and before he eats all the smurfberries, Papa Smurf finds the magic stick and whisks the giant away.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Rose: Smurfette promises Mother Nature that if she creates a blue rose Smurfette will never cut it. But when the white rose becomes blue, Smurfette becomes white. The only way to make Smurfette blue again is for her to cut the rose. She reluctantly cuts the rose, returning nature to normalcy and learning that one cannot always keep a promise.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Lost City Of Yore: Curiosity brings Nosey Smurf to the lair of the Hag Sisters, who want to find the terrifying Sceptre of Yore... And Gargamel wants to cheat the two witches as he tries to destroy the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfic Games: The Smurfs discover the spirit and joy of friendly competition when they hold their first "Smurfic Games". After a near miss with the troublesome cat Azrael, the Smurfs decide they need to get into better shape. Papa Smurf suggests that the Smurfs tone their bodies as well as sharpen their athletic abilities by inaugurating the "Smurfic Games".

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Golden Tresses: Hogatha, the repulsive witch, captures the Smurfette. She wants to steal from the little blue beauty her golden hair. Can the Smurfs save their little female companion before it is too late? Can Hogatha grow hair like Smurfette's?

programme.title: The Purple Smurfs
programme.desc: The purple fly bites Lazy and an epidemic starts that turns the little villagers into angry, purple Smurfs. Papa Smurf discovers that the pollen from a tuberose flower is an antidote and soon things are smurfy again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - April Smurf's Day: April Smurf's Day turns out to be not so funny when Gargamel dons a smurfberry bush disguise to capture the happy little Smurfs. Papa Smurf instructs Feathers to call the birds to attack the fake bush. After it is stripped, the captured Smurfs climb aboard Feathers and fly away.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bringing Up Bigfeet: Remember Bigmouth, the ogre, and his lovely wife Bignose? They have a baby now: tiny (by ogre standards) Bigfeet. As the Smurflings Snappy, Slouchy and Nat, and of course the ever-willing Sassette are not entitled to baby-sit Baby Smurf, they volunteer to watch over Bigfeet, while its parents are at the Ogre Ball. The little Smurfs will get more than what they expected...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bubble, Bubble, Smurfs In Trouble: Each morning, dew is deposited by water sprites on forest leaves. Wait till you see what happens when Scaredy Smurf gets hold of the dew-making magic wand...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel conjures a spell that makes Puppy think he's a cat. Papa receives a prescription from Homnibus to reverse the spell and all the Smurfs help. As Puppy becomes a dog again, Gargamel gets too close and he becomes a cat.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Village Vandal: Nasty wizard Gargamel has had enough of the Smurfs' permanent superiority. He decides to destroy their Village once and for all. This is why he trains a termite to ravage, demolish, devastate and raze all the houses in its path. But the effect is even worse than Gargamel imagined as the Smurfs think that their Village is being torn apart by the antics of the Smurflings.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Brainy's Smarty Party: Brainy invites all the Smurfs to his party but kicks them out one by one when they don't have fun the way he instructs them. All the outcasts throw their own party and are gracious enough to allow Brainy to join them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A terrible giant called Bigmouth helps Gargamel hunt the Smurfs so he can feast on Soup a la Smurf. Papa Smurf tricks the big monster and then convinces him that Soup a la Gargamel is a far more appetizing dish than smurfy soup.

programme.title: Zig & Sharko
programme.desc: Marina and Sharko board a luxury liner for a cruise disguised as humans... Zig and Bernie join as stowaways. When Sharko's identity is discovered, all humans leave ship. Bernie is assigned to the helm, while the usual chase takes place on board. | The island is covered in a thick blanket of fog. A gigantic lighthouse has been built in the middle of the lagoon, preventing Zig from being able to see his mermaid. Zig decides to demolish it but the lighthouse keeper doesn't agree... | In order to catch the mermaid, Zig begins to build a whole series of vessels. Starting with the simplest raft, he works his way up to a huge aircraft carrier.

programme.title: Zig & Sharko
programme.sub-title: Season 1 - The ghastly ghost | Volcano Turbo | The Island Tour

All of the island's inhabitants are at the starting line inside their customized vehicles.

programme.title: Mia and me
programme.desc: When in town, Mia and Mario are helping a man loading his van. And they are surprised to find out that he's Violetta's father. With a new oracle, Mia arrives shortly after in Centopia where everybody seems to be irritated by a terrible sound. Phuddle tells the Elves that the sound is from the Feast of the Whistling Bolobo and all pans are making music to make him reply to their music. Since Mia and her friends need the Pan King's help to decipher the runes on the crown, and in order to stop the annoying sound, they try to find out who or what is behind this mysterious Bolobo.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas – forever! Papa Smurf directs Painter to switch his paints and before long, Maestro is enshrined in a picture next to his dream girl, Smurfette.

programme.title: Mia and me
programme.desc: Mia and her grandpa are out for fishing on the lake when at the same time Violetta and her mother get stranded nearby when their car conks out. Renzo offers them a lift… In Centopia, Mia and her friends are planning an expedition to the icy North Horn. But first they have to get the fiery flower from the Fire Unicorn's volcano. King Raynor told them that the hot and spicy petals of this flower protect the one who eats them from the cold. But whoever picks the flower will burn to death!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: Mia and me

In Centopia, Onchao has a boys-day-out with Esko, while Kyara leaves the Elven Crater unnoticed. The Elves try to find her back - but Dax and the Hoppers are always one step ahead. Kyara gets lost in the forest, where she finds Lavera and her unicorn Kindergarten group.

programme.title: Zig & Sharko
programme.sub-title: Season 2 - LOL Zig | Daddy little doggy | Bad hair day
programme.desc: A chase between Zig and Sharko ends with the hyena getting covered in pizza. Haha! Marina takes a picture and posts it on social networks. Unexpectedly, the photo makes Zig the Star of the Beach…LOL ! | Marina wants a dog and then Zig comes along! The hyena doesn't put up a fuss: as long as he can approach the mermaid he doesn't care. Even if it means playing daddy's little doggy with Sharko? | Zig uses a fake moustache to approach Marina. Of course Sharko exposes him, but all the beach people like the stranger with the stache! Sharko comes back to the beach wearing a wig. Now they're even…

programme.title: The Smurfs

But they are struggling to escape extinction. Despite the protection of their breeding islands, numbers fall. Scientists race to find the answers for the staggering decline. programme.title: Brazil: A Natural History
programme.desc: Brazil's coast stretches 7,500 kilometres from the cool temperate waters of the south to the mouth of the Amazon, the equator and beyond, with a large number of remote islands off the coast. Undoubtedly the most formidable is Snake Island, providing habitat for one of the most poisonous sankes on earth.

programme.title: Oceans Of Contrast
programme.desc: Southern Africa has a dramatic landscape. Two contrasting currents, the cold Benguela on the west and south, and the warm Agulhas on the east, bathe the shores. These two contrasting oceans create one of the most diverse marine environments on Earth with abundance in life. The two marine currents not only rule the marine world but they are giant forces that shape the landscape through the climate.

programme.title: Sounds Of The Seas
programme.desc: We join marine biologist Antonella Servido as she investigates the mystery of the Canary Island pilot whales in this stunning documentary film, Sounds of the Seas. Why is it that an increasing number of these beautiful animals are becoming fatally stranded? Antonella wants answers and will not stop until she finds them.

programme.title: Two Oceans
programme.desc: The cold Benguela current along the fringes of the west coast of southern Africa is synonymous with coastal upwelling. Consequently, massive stands of kelp forest are attached to shallow rocky reefs. In fact, the entire coastal ecosystem is driven by these giant plants, that feed the rocky and sandy shores of this golden forest. (S1, Ep1)

programme.title: Two Oceans
programme.desc: The cold Benguela current along the fringes of the west coast of southern Africa is synonymous with coastal upwelling. programme.title: Two Oceans
programme.desc: The cold Benguela current along the fringes of the west coast of southern Africa is synonymous with coastal upwelling. programme.title: Hoanib
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Desert Elephants
programme.desc: The Namib, one of the most hostile deserts on Earth. Without a firm survival strategy, no living soul will make it here. Yet, surprisingly, some species have adapted their lifestyles to these extreme conditions: chameleons, beetles, snakes and mammals are all at home here. The film follows a family of desert elephants that has also adapted to this habitat.

programme.title: The Wild Andes: Extreme Survival
programme.desc: Against a dramatic backdrop of super-heated geysers, arid grasslands and snow-capped volcanos, the fortunes of a newborn vicuna foal, and that of a flamingo colony, unfold. This is the breath-taking story of how animals on the high, central Andean plains have adapted to a world fired by volcanic heat and pinched by thirst and thin air.

programme.title: Search for the Ghost Bears
programme.desc: Our film journey begins in Alaska's west. We are hoping to find glacier bears in the glacial regions of the Katmai National Park on the Douglas River. At the end of July, brown bears have now arrived to fish for salmon. In the surrounding forests, grizzlies look for berries and fresh, green twigs. The Katmai is Alaska's most volcanic area, and with 15 active volcanoes it is a veritable powder keg, surrounded by glaciers. In the Hook glacier region moose and lynx accompany us. Bald eagles have arrived at the glacial boundary and begin to tear apart their freshly caught prey. At last, we catch sight of a glacier bear. Hungry, he has left the ice region and has been forced down here in search of food, which he satisfies extensively with fresh shoots and berries. Continuing our film trip, we head for Prince Royal Island in British Columbia. En route, we meet with black bears on their way with their young to fish for salmon. The mother bears have to remain alert to protect their young, as we have spotted some New World porcupines too. Then, out of the blue, directly in front of us: the Kermode, or spirit bear. He shows no signs of timidity and is only interested in one thing: salmon. Then, a further Kermode appears, enjoying his cranberry dessert, allowing us to approach him, almost too close for comfort. But a black bear arrives on the scene and claims the cranberry bush for itself. After a brief confrontation, the Kermode opts to leave, preferring to focus on salmon fishing. Fascinating footage of this rare species of animal.

programme.title: The Original Fight Club: Animal Fights Caught on Camera
programme.desc: There are many reasons for animals to fight and each have their own weapons and rules of combat. They rarely fight without good reason: usually to defend a patch, secure a meal or to attract a mate. With so many reasons for warfare, life can be a never ending battle – for all creatures no matter how great or small, life is a struggle – but they endure – perhaps because there is a fighter in us all …

programme.title: The Incredible Five
programme.desc: Cheetahs are the high-speed hunters of the Savannah. Few attempt to take on larger prey than gazelles or smallish antelopes. But on occasion, the predatory cats reveal their surprisingly different side. In the Northern Serengeti, a group of male cheetahs emerges and turns all we know about them upside down. Males are usually loners or live in small groups, but here we have five tomcats hunting together as one. It is actually, the largest alliance of the animals ever seen! This film has many stories to tell about the sleek hunters.

programme.title: Moksgm'ol
programme.sub-title: The Quest for the Spirit Bear
programme.desc: A forest that lives off fish, a white bear that is not a polar bear, and wolves that feed off the ocean… Canada's Great Bear Rain Forest is a strange and pristine world, a land that time almost forgot. The awe-inspiring northern coastline of British Columbia with its great fjords that rival those in Norway, is the habitat of numerous species and the scene for the amazing co-existence of wolves, ravens, salmon, bears and a mystical rainforest, whose lives are intricately intertwined…

programme.title: Hoanib
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Desert Elephants
programme.desc: The Namib, one of the most hostile deserts on Earth. Without a firm survival strategy, no living soul will make it here. Yet, surprisingly, some species have adapted their lifestyles to these extreme conditions: chameleons, beetles, snakes and mammals are all at home here. The film follows a family of desert elephants that has also adapted to this habitat.

programme.title: SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021.
